title: Person Of Interest - No more obstacles
author: Novus Destiny
comment: In the world of Person of Interest, this episode's ending marks the dawn of a new era for mankind - and not a good one. I find the solemn, melancholic soundtrack immensely fitting and moving.
this show becomes more relevant and impactful every day.
Probably the best montage in a show full of amazing montages. The choice of music is so perfect.
Why did Harold leave Shaw and John out to dry? He just left them, to defend for themselves. Yes, they can take care of themselves. Its just a sad episode.   Chirp
description: Ending of 'Death Benefit' episode. Music Medicine by Daughter
